ticket.subject: Login session expires too quickly
ticket.description: Session timeout after 15 minutes is too short for my workflow and requires constant re-login

ticket.subject: Cannot update credit card on file
ticket.description: Payment page shows error when trying to replace expired card with new card information

ticket.subject: Feature request: Template library for common tasks
ticket.description: Would save time to have pre-built templates for frequently used configurations and workflows

ticket.subject: Application error after latest update
ticket.description: Since yesterday's update getting continuous error popup saying 'Component failed to initialize properly'

ticket.subject: Forgot password but security questions not working
ticket.description: Answering security questions correctly but system says answers are incorrect and won't reset password

ticket.subject: Very slow loading times on reports page
ticket.description: Reports page takes 2-3 minutes to load even with fast internet connection and powerful computer

ticket.subject: Invoice shows wrong tax calculation
ticket.description: Latest invoice calculates 10% tax but my location should only be charged 7% sales tax rate

ticket.subject: Bug: Copy-paste functionality not working
ticket.description: Cannot copy and paste text within application using keyboard shortcuts or right-click menu

ticket.subject: 2FA backup codes not displaying
ticket.description: When I click to view backup codes the page is blank and codes never load on screen

ticket.subject: How to downgrade subscription plan
ticket.description: Need to switch from premium plan to basic plan to reduce costs starting next billing cycle

ticket.subject: Error 404 when accessing settings page
ticket.description: Clicking on account settings link results in 404 page not found error every single time

ticket.subject: Need to pause subscription temporarily
ticket.description: Going on vacation for 2 months and want to pause subscription without losing account data

ticket.subject: Feature suggestion: Multi-language support
ticket.description: Please add support for Spanish and French languages to make app accessible to our international team

ticket.subject: Cannot access account - email not recognized
ticket.description: System says my email address doesn't exist in database but I've been customer for 2 years

ticket.subject: Overcharged for premium features not used
ticket.description: Billed for premium tier but never activated or used any premium features this entire month

ticket.subject: Video player not working in Chrome browser
ticket.description: Embedded videos show black screen and won't play in Chrome but work fine in Firefox

ticket.subject: Request for volume discount pricing info
ticket.description: Planning to purchase 100+ licenses and would like information about enterprise volume discounts available

ticket.subject: Bug: Date picker shows dates in wrong format
ticket.description: Date picker displays MM/DD/YYYY but my regional settings are DD/MM/YYYY causing confusion and errors

ticket.subject: Account locked due to suspicious activity
ticket.description: Received email about suspicious login attempt and now entire account is locked and inaccessible

ticket.subject: Discount code from email promotion invalid
ticket.description: Received email with code SPRING25 but checkout page says code is invalid or expired already

ticket.subject: File attachments not uploading correctly
ticket.description: Attachments upload but then show as corrupted files that cannot be opened or downloaded by anyone

ticket.subject: Feature request: Webhook integrations
ticket.description: Need webhook support to integrate platform with our internal systems for automated data synchronization

ticket.subject: Two-factor authentication keeps getting disabled
ticket.description: Enable 2FA security but it mysteriously gets disabled after few days requiring me to set up again

ticket.subject: Interface not responsive on mobile devices
ticket.description: Mobile version has overlapping buttons and text that's cut off making it impossible to navigate properly

ticket.subject: Question about data retention policies
ticket.description: How long do you retain deleted data and what is process for permanent data deletion from servers?

ticket.subject: Print function produces garbled output
ticket.description: Printing reports creates documents with jumbled text and misaligned columns that are completely unreadable

ticket.subject: Cannot invite collaborators to workspace
ticket.description: Invitation emails are not being sent when I try to add new team members to shared workspace

ticket.subject: Feature idea: Activity audit log access
ticket.description: Need ability to view complete audit log of all account activities for compliance and security monitoring

ticket.subject: Automatic logout happening too frequently
ticket.description: Getting logged out automatically every few hours even when actively using application which disrupts my work

ticket.subject: General inquiry about GDPR compliance
ticket.description: Is your service GDPR compliant and where can I find documentation about data privacy practices?
